name: FlappyMind
description:
Flappy Mind uses the NeuroSky MindWave Mobile Bluetooth headset (NOT MINDWAVE MOBILE PLUS!) to allow your mind to control a game that is very much like Flappy Bird. You must focus your attention to not collide with the pipes!

Watch this short video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S9YnGoKb7x8
